name: Fox Path
description:
Description
In this simple logic game you need to clear the way for the fox's den. Your task is to set proper path by eliminating all the seasons-related dangers.

Controls
LMB drag & drop to change season

Credits
Agnieszka Marcinkiewicz - 2D graphics
Malyglut - programming
Sebastian Senski  - programming
Marcin Wierzchoś  - programming
